name: CSSPageRule
description: CSSPageRule is an interface representing a single CSS @page rule. It implements the CSSRule interface with a type value of 6 (CSSRule.PAGE_RULE).

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM)
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSPageRule' in CSS Object Model (CSSOM).

refs.description: The definition of 'CSSPageRule' in Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification.
